typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		FilePath as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		DatasetTableName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TableFromQuery
source(output(
		FilePath as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		DatasetTableName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TableFromView
DistinctTFQ derive(Dataset = split(DatasetTableName, '.')[1],
		Name = split(DatasetTableName, '.')[2]) ~> SplitTFQ
DistinctTFV derive(Dataset = split(DatasetTableName, '.')[2],
		Name = split(DatasetTableName, '.')[3]) ~> SplitTFV
SplitTFQ, SplitTFV union(byName: true)~> CombineData
CombineData aggregate(groupBy(Dataset,
		Name),
	FilePath = first(FilePath)) ~> DistinctData
DistinctData alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> UpsertTables
TableFromQuery aggregate(groupBy(FilePath,
		DatasetTableName),
	LineNumber = first(LineNumber)) ~> DistinctTFQ
TableFromView aggregate(groupBy(FilePath,
		DatasetTableName),
	LineNumber = first(LineNumber)) ~> DistinctTFV
UpsertTables sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TestSinkTables.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		Dataset,
		Name,
		FilePath
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TestResult
